name: Stalwart Marksmanship
desc: Gain Weapon Advantage against Bows, While Unit has weapon advantage, +50% Damage dealt, Otherwise -25% Damage taken.
components: not((combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, item, target.get_weapon()) and  combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, item, target.get_weapon()).accuracy > 0))
